aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.description: Bedrock Agent 호출 및 분석 결과 저장

aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.buildSpec:
version: 1
applications:
  - appRoot: frontend
    frontend:
      phases:
        preBuild:
          commands:
            - npm ci
        build:
          commands:
            - npm run build
      artifacts:
        baseDirectory: out
        files:
          - '**/*'
      cache:
        paths:
          - node_modules/**/*
aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.name: career-doomsday-clock
